Description: Rim and body sherd of Chian pottery Type B2 kantharos; white slip; interior: reserved band on top of rim, glazed streaky black below save forbroad reserved band at centre of sherd; exterior reserved.
Curator's comments: According to Williams (1983a 169), Type B2 kantharoi have a reserved band in the centre of the interior surface. Williams, D. ‘Aigina, Aphaia-Tempel 5. The pottery from Chios’, Archäologischer Anzeiger 1983
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1664) (phase 2)
